Name: Dreams with Furry
About the game: Dreams with Furry  Dreams with Furry is a collection of short stories featuring Furry Girls and Match 3 gameplay. Cleopatra, Mulan, Catherine the Great and Joan of Arc are now furry girls! Embark on an exciting journey through different historical periods! Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere. Contains mini-stories about various professions with furry girls A classic Match 3 game, but at the heart of the game is an advanced dialogue system and a story set in an alternate universe. Features: 20+ levels 4 Lovely Furry Girls 3 in a row Historical horror Relaxing gameplay Cute atmosphere
